recipe_name: French Puff Pastry Tart with Pears and Chocolate
ingredients: +   1/2 cup unsalted butter,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 cup blanched almond flour, 2  eggs, 1 sheet frozen puff pastry, thawed, 4 ounces milk chocolate, chopped, 3  pears - peeled, cored and sliced
nutrition: Total Fat 36g 46%, Saturated Fat 14g 68%, Cholesterol 80mg 27%, Sodium 106mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 51g 18%, Dietary Fiber 5g 16%, Total Sugars 30g, Protein 9g, Vitamin C 3mg 13%, Calcium 45mg 3%, Iron 1mg 8%, Potassium 165mg 4%
